> triad (yeah, i decided Oldschool isn't much of a medieval name) is, 
> uh, from a normal background, grew up with some farmers or something. 
> i kinda forget what i said before, but he relies heavily on his bow 
> and arrows, he does carry a dagger, but will rarely use it to fight, 
> mainly uses it to cut some new arrows and whatnot. if anyone's ever 
> read the books with Joe Pike in them, that's who he's modeled after, 
> only no hand-to-hand combat and no shades. he loves the exploding 
> bolt and anything else that can take lots of people out from far away.
> 
> he's in the fight for a test cuz, uh, he's bored. he also wants to 
> magic-ify his bow to make bigger explosions and whatnot. he can't be 
> distracted easily, but if he is then forget it, he'll be gone for 
> days at a time. he can function good with little sleep (from growin 
> up on the ol' farm) but hates being interrupted in his sleep. will 
> that cover it?
> 

Yeah that's pretty good. But what about general attitude? Is this guy really disagreeable, wary of the good guy group, reckless or what?
And are you mentioning "magicify"ing his arrows to make them better as a cool idea you want me to incorporate?
Props to you for giving a good character description. Rory could take a lesson from you. If I can't get anything I'll just have to set my creative powers to work.

-Zjack
